item.title: Introduction to Domain Names & Web Hosting(Free Domain Name)
item.description: Domain Names Section: We provide an overview of the domain name registration process. item.title: NodeJs: Build The Complete E-Commerce Web API [2021]
item.description:
What is Node.js? Node.js, or Node, is a runtime environment for executing JavaScript code outside of a browser. It is ideal for building highly-scalable, data-intensive backend services (APIs) that power your client’s apps (web or mobile apps).
Why Should learn Node? Node is great for prototyping and agile development as well as building super fast and highly scalable apps; Companies like Uber and PayPal use Node in production to build applications because it requires fewer people and less code.
